Class DescriptionPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • graphanalyzer.view.panels.DescriptionPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocaleChangeListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class DescriptionPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements LocaleChangeListener
    A class the displays information of the current algorithm state.

    Author:
    paulehler
